0000	add2
0001	add2i
0010	sub2
0011	sub2i
0100	cmp
0101	cmpi
0110	let
0111	leti
1000	shift
10010	readze
10011	readse
1010	jump
1011	jumpif
110000	or2
110001	or2i
110010	and2
110011	and2i
110100	write
110101	call
110110	setctr
110111	getctr
1110000	push
1110001	return
1110010	add3
1110011	add3i
1110100	sub3
1110101	sub3i
1110110	and3
1110111	and3i
1111000	or3
1111001	or3i
1111010	xor3
1111011	xor3i
1111100	asr3
1111101	(res1)
1111110	(res2)
1111111	(res3)
